name: Dice Try Again
text:
Roll a six-sided die, and if the result is 1 or 6, add 1 card that has a dice rolling effect, from your Deck to your hand. Otherwise, roll a six-sided die again and apply the result.
? 1 or 6: Return this card from the field to the hand.
? 2, 3, 4, 5: Place this card from the field on the top of the Deck.
You can only activate 1 "Dice Try Again" per turn.
